loka welenda pole gas mila sanshodhanaya wimath samanga janathawata sahana salasime aramunin rajaya me thiranaya gath bawa, samupakara saha abhyanthara welenda amathi jonstan pranandu mahatha pawasiya.masa dekakata warak paribhogika adhikariya mangin gath thindu thirana menma loka welendapole siyaluma bhanda sambandha mila adhyanaya kirime kamituwa wisin kala adhyayana walin pasuwa gas samagam samanga kala sakachchawalin pasuwa mese mila adukirimata piyawara gath bawada amathiwaraya penwa dunneya.idiriyedith loka welanda pole gasmila wenaswim sambandhayen paribhogika amathyanshaya niranthara adhyayan sidu karana athara gas mila adukala haki sama awasthawakadima ehi wasiya paribhogika janathawa wenuwen pahasukam salasana bawada hethema pawasiya.
